entry.title: FORMER DEPUTY ARRESTED FOR EMBEZZLEMENT
entry.summary: December 12, 2023 5:15 p.m. At the request of the Douglas County Sheriff’s Office, Roseburg Police conducted an investigation into allegations that a former Douglas County Corrections Deputy had embezzled money. Sergeant Daniel Allen said during the investigation, former deputy Peter Collins, a 44-year old Roseburg resident, admitted to embezzling more than $100,000 from the...

entry.title: Discussions start about improvements on Diamond Lake Boulevard
entry.summary: Family-style seating and free pizza welcomed communal conversation regarding safety and mobility improvements to Diamond Lake Boulevard on Monday night. It was just shy of two hours of “what ifs.”

entry.title: WYDEN DEMANDS FEDERAL REVIEW OF CRATER LAKE CONTRACT

entry.title: Homeless Commission shelves plans for Winchester Street camp following public outcry
entry.summary: A proposal to locate a campground for the unhoused on Northeast Winchester Street in Roseburg was quickly scuttled by the city’s Homeless Commission on Monday following a public meeting in which speaker after speaker railed against the idea.

entry.title: WISH UPON A STAR 12.11.23
entry.summary: Another season of giving begins with Wish Upon A Star from Brooke Communications and Rogue Credit Union. Today, we are introduced to a young woman who just lost a parent, a rock and a mentor. Faced with a mountain of stuff to accomplish, loose ends to tie up, all while trying to grieve the loss.

entry.title: City of Reedsport seeks to fill vacant city council position
entry.summary: REEDSPORT — The city of Reedsport is seeking to fill a vacant seat on the Reedsport City Council until Dec. 31, 2024. During the general election in Nov. 2024, that same position will be open for a new four-year term.
